banner.title: Discover Videos with AI

step2.description: Add YouTube channels you want to follow

instantSummaries.title: Daily Video Summaries

info.title: Add Your YouTube Channels
info.description: Add the YouTube channels you want to follow. You can use the channel URL or @username format.

steps.step3: Channel will be automatically added to your follow list
steps.step4: You'll receive notifications when new videos are uploaded

errors.addFailed: Failed to add channel. Please make sure you're entering a valid YouTube channel URL.
errors.channelExists: This channel is already in your follow list
errors.invalidUrl: Invalid YouTube channel URL. Please use the '@channelname' format or the full channel URL.
errors.channelNotFound: Channel not found. This YouTube channel does not exist or the channel URL is incorrect.
errors.notAChannel: The URL you entered is not a YouTube channel. Please enter a channel URL instead of a video URL.

errors.apiNotFound: API service is not available. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.videoProcessingFailed: An error occurred while processing the video.
errors.feedbackFailed: An error occurred while submitting feedback.

about.title: About
about.description: Veciz AI is a tool that summarizes YouTube videos with artificial intelligence and creates transcripts, helping you track your favorite channels and never miss content with daily summaries.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions? Contact us at hello@veciz.ai
